survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Biometric Attendance Systems Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the usability, privacy concerns, and overall satisfaction with biometric attendance systems implemented in the workplace.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the biometric attendance system?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: This helps assess adoption rates and frequency of use.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the biometric attendance system?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of the biometric attendance system?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who selected 'Daily' or 'Several times a week' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of the biometric attendance system?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who selected 'Daily' or 'Several times a week' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have regarding the privacy of your biometric data?
answer_options: Lack of transparency in data usage
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify common privacy concerns.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with an optional open-ended 'Other' field.

script.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have regarding the privacy of your biometric data?
answer_options: Lack of transparency in data usage
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Please describe any technical issues you have encountered with the biometric attendance system.
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Rarely' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture specific technical challenges.

script.question_text: Please describe any technical issues you have encountered with the biometric attendance system.
script.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Rarely' in Q1.

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the biometric attendance system to other organizations?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge overall satisfaction.
